name: fsharp-fable-elmish-example
description: F# Fable Elmish example, with Preact and Vite.
author: Laurent Payot

scripts.restore: dotnet tool restore && dotnet paket restore
scripts.start: pnpm cleanup && dotnet fable watch app.fsproj --outDir output --sourceMaps --run pnpm vite
scripts.build: pnpm cleanup && dotnet fable app.fsproj --outDir output --run pnpm vite build
scripts.size:brotli: echo "JS size: `brotli -Zcn dist/assets/index-*.js | wc -c | numfmt --to=iec` brotli compressed"
scripts.serve: pnpm dlx http-server dist -a localhost --port 5000 --proxy http://localhost:5000?
